casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Triplett, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Triplett, 130 Ohio St.3d 272, 2011-Ohio-5717.]

(No. 2011-0851 Submitted November 2, 2011 Decided November 9, 2011.) Julia R. Bates, Lucas County Prosecuting Attorney, and David F. Cooper, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Jeffrey M. Gamso and Jeffrey J. Helmick, for appellant.

{¶ 1} Appellant has filed a motion for reconsideration of the court’s denial of the discretionary appeal in this matter, reported at 129 Ohio St.3d 1453, 2011-Ohio-4217, 951 N.E.2d 1048.

{¶ 2} The motion for reconsideration is granted. The discretionary appeal is accepted. The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Lester, 130 Ohio St.3d 303, 2011-Ohio-5204, 958 N.E.2d 142.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur. Lanzinger, J., dissents.
